website_summaries.verdict: From decorations to gifting, these 1,000 stickers will go a long way and are the best choice for kids and adults who love Christmas and stickers.
pros: An affordable set of stickers with a variety of beloved Christmas designs, including snowmen, candy canes, ornaments, and more
A good value, too, because you get 10 rolls with 100 stickers per roll
Paper backing is perforated and easy to separate so you can distribute stickers individually
cons: Some of the stickers tend to be difficult to remove from the backings, which can result in tears

customer_reviews.title: I love these! The spaces between the stickers are perforated ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The spaces between the stickers are perforated so you can tear each sticker apart to hand out individually to kids or at work or something. I took a couple rolls and left them at work. I gate a couple rolls to my mom and a couple of the neighborhood kids. I kept a couple rolls for myself for Christmas cards. Stickers are sticky and the colors are bright. Thank you for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ann

customer_reviews.title: A TON of Stickers
customer_reviews.text: So many stickers! I bought these to include in Christmas cards to people who had children. I've also added it to Christmas cards I send my nieces/nephews with checks or money. Since kids don't appreciate opening cards with just a check, these stickers really spruce it up. There are a ton of stickers! I probably didn't need this many. This would be a great buy for a teacher, doctor's office, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good stickers
customer_reviews.text: These are good stickers. I do not lick envelopes (gross!) so I bought these to seal Christmas cards & they worked perfectly. They are larger than they look on the pictures. They were the perfect size for what I needed & they stick very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Great, nice sized stickers
customer_reviews.text: A whole lot of stickers! If you don't want a TON of stickers then don't order these LOL! Great, nice sized stickers. Cute and pretty. Stick well. I've used them for class prizes for kids, and some of them are nice enough to stick on xmas cards.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Spielman

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I stilt walk at a tree lighting ceremony each year. We decided to start giving stickers out to the kids to make it a little more fun. I order these stickers each year as they are cost effective and help make sure we don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of colorful Christmas stickers. Very pretty. Each roll wrapped in a clear cover.
customer_reviews.author: Faye B

customer_reviews.title: great for sealing envelopes on holiday cards
customer_reviews.text: Using stickers to seal them is so much better than licking a bunch of envelopes, and it adds a festive touch to the envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Ame62676

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THAT THEY ARE PERFORATED!
customer_reviews.text: Great stickers! I love that they are perforated, made separating them a breeze! We handed them out to all the kids during our Santa Visit and they loved them. I worried about the foil stickers from a previous review of them being difficult to remove, but they were very easy to remove from the backing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have 400 clients and needed these stickers (size) to put on their Christmas cards for 2019. I am getting a head start in writing them out so ready by December. Can't necessarily find these type of stickers in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Harvey

customer_reviews.title: These are not super high quality stickers
customer_reviews.text: These are not super high quality stickers. My kid's preschool class assigned me to get stickers for the christmas party and these were perfect for massive amounts of stick stickers anywhere kind of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stickers for a kids Christmas party! I highly recommend them! Bright colorful and fun!
customer_reviews.author: MR Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent assortment and quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent assortment of stickers. These are perfect for Operation Christmas Child. I'm using them to decorate the shoe boxes. This was the best deal I could find and the quality is great. If I run out I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: J Ryall

customer_reviews.title: great value! More than enough stickers to share with ...
customer_reviews.text: great value! More than enough stickers to share with everyone. The next time I buy, I'll send the other half to school with my daughter. Her teacher will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun stickers
customer_reviews.text: Great and fun stickers, arrived on time, worked nicely as an added bit of festivity on my Christmas cards as well as adding tags to gift. Lots of labels for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B. Landes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stickers
customer_reviews.text: Came as pictured. Brightly colored with a nice array of designs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are an amazing deal for the price. There is also a good variety.
customer_reviews.author: grnsun85

customer_reviews.title: cute stickers!
customer_reviews.text: The stickers had a good variation, and the selection was cute! the stickers were about a half dollar coin size 1000 stickers should surely be enough for my students!
customer_reviews.author: kajyuyo

customer_reviews.title: Great Teacher Gift
customer_reviews.text: 1000 stickers - for real! The price could not have been better and my son's K teacher was thrilled to receive them. Excellent quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Margarete Hays

customer_reviews.title: Children and adults love them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent assortment. Nice variety and sizes. A lot to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect no need to conserve them for this price I ...
customer_reviews.text: have a kid that loves stickers? these are perfect no need to conserve them for this price I let my kids use as many as they want and give them away at school
customer_reviews.author: M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great Stickers..super big
customer_reviews.text: Larger stickers than I thought they'd be. About as big as a 1/2 dollar. Beautiful Christmas Stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Aurelia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Anxious to put on my Holiday cards and on some packages too!
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Holiday Card envelopes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...at an excellent price for the quantity...!
customer_reviews.author: Yo Adrienne!

customer_reviews.title: Super-Duper Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: The K-3 kids at school loved their project with these stickers! Great assortment and high quality. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CSC in PHILLY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: While I love these stickers, I was jipped a whole 100 of them. Which is upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Holiday stickets for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an event that features a kids-only Christmas shop. We put the gifts kids bought in red bags and let them sticker them. Worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: E. Speyer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice holiday stickers!
customer_reviews.text: These wet inexpensive and I thought they would be cheap. Pleasantly surprising that the colors are bright and the paper is thick with nice sticky adhesive. I keep using these for all kinds of uses. I seal envelopes with them, decorate packages, and I have even given a few rolls to my daughter's teachers to use as "reward" stickers. These are great quality and I will be ordering more! These would be awesome to hand out at a doctors or dentist office. I wish there were a few more designs, just for even better variety. But that would give it six stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: Stickers Galore
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to put on the back of Christmas cards. The were better than expected and sooooo many of them. The sparkly snowflake ones were hard to get off the paper, but my daughter thought they were Frozen stickers just for her so they were on instant hit.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Foiled Again!
customer_reviews.text: The foil stickers would not release from the roll. Each would tear off with the paper backing still intact. It was like splitting an atom to finally get one to work. Very frustrating! The foil stickers were also misprinted now and then on the roll. 5 stars for Amazon Prime for the refund and return.
customer_reviews.author: qwikreadswork4me

customer_reviews.title: fun and unexpensive for arts and krafts
customer_reviews.text: So much fun during christmas when the kids were making all kinds of neat christmas cards to give out. We still have loads of stickers for next year, hurray!
customer_reviews.author: trinh martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality! Well worth the money! Would recommend to anyone!!! Stickers are bright and don't have any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Compeau

product_meta.title: Fun Express - Holiday Roll Sticker Assortment (10rls) for Christmas - Stationery - Stickers - Stickers - Roll - Christmas - 10 Pieces
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Holiday Sticker Assortment. Celebrate the season with this colorful collection of stickers! Classic Christmas characters, snowflakes and more make up this festive collection! Stick these holiday adhesives on cards, scrapbook pages, notes and more! Hand them out in treat bags or use them to decorate presents! (100 stickers per roll, 10 rolls per unit, shrink-wrapped) 1 1/2" Assortment may vary.
feature_bullets: Holiday Roll of Stickers Assortment. Celebrate the season with this colorful collection of stickers. Classic Christmas characters, snowflakes and more make up this festive collection. Stick these holiday adhesives on cards, scrapbook pages, notes and more. Hand them out in treat bags or use them to decorate presents. (100 stickers per roll, 10 rolls per unit, shrink-wrapped) 1 1/2" Assortment may vary. OTC
